title: (x) Great Wall logo humanist sans - ITC Stone Sans {Nick Cooke}
content:

author: MiseEnAbime

comments.content: Uhm, the uppercase G looks different.

funny, this was posted to logopond this morning

It was customized. Makes sense for a logo.
